page.title: 03BEER LACE
page.content: {Beer lace}is often confused with Honiton Lace.This is because when it was sent off to different places in olden times the boxes were marked "HONITON" because they were sent from Honiton to London. The most famous pieces were:the dress of Queen Victoria,Queen Mary's dress and the piece presented to Prince Charles and Princess Diana.Mrs A.Allen and Mrs Bidney were famous makers of Beer Lace. Nowadays it is still made by a band of village ladies.They made the Prince and Princess of Wales a wedding piece which was in the form of the three feathers and the motto"ICH DIEN".
